original_text: Wherefore the children of Israel shall keep the sabbath, to observe the sabbath throughout their generations, for a perpetual covenant.
korean_text: 이같이 이스라엘 자손이 안식일을 지켜서 그것으로 대대로 영원한 언약을 삼을 것이니

sentences.original_text: Wherefore the children of Israel shall keep the sabbath
to observe the sabbath throughout their generations
